column6: Concepts and Issues in Special Education II
column7: Seminar in current concepts and issues relating to all children with special needs; introduction to grant proposal writing; and introduction to journal reviewing; requires critical review of key readings and preparation of a literature review of a topic of current research in special education. Prerequisite: SPED 592 or consent of instructor.
column9: Prerequisite: SPED 592 or consent of instructor.
